description: Kaspersky has released a new virus removal tool named KVRT for the Linux platform, allowing users to scan their systems and remove malware and other known threats for free. [...]
title: Kaspersky releases free tool that scans Linux for known threats

description: Google is continuing with its plan to phase out Manifest V2 extensions in Chrome starting in early June 2024, weakening the abilities of ad blockers. [...]
title: Google Chrome change that weakens ad blockers begins June 3rd
